AirQualityIndex.label: Air Quality Index
AirQualityIndex.details: Details about Temperature and other data

GlacierMassBalance.label: Glacier Mass Balance
GlacierMassBalance.details: Connected to atmospheric temperature, solar radiation absorption, and snow cover. Influences sea level and water availability.

Precipitation.label: Precipitation
Precipitation.details: Affects water quality, soil composition, forest cover, and erosion rates. Linked to changes in atmospheric temperature and greenhouse gases.

GreenhouseGasesCO2COCH4.label: Greenhouse Gases (CO2, CO, CH4)
GreenhouseGasesCO2COCH4.details: Elevates atmospheric temperature, alters precipitation, impacts solar radiation absorption, and contributes to glacier mass loss.

AtmosphericTemperature.label: Atmospheric Temperature
AtmosphericTemperature.details: Influences greenhouse gas levels, precipitation patterns, sea surface temperature (SST), and snow cover duration.

SolarRadiationAbsorption.label: Solar Radiation Absorption
SolarRadiationAbsorption.details: Alters atmospheric temperature, greenhouse gas effects, SST, and snow cover. Affected by atmospheric composition and land cover.

ErosionRates.label: Erosion Rates
ErosionRates.details: Tied to soil quality, precipitation, forest cover, and water quality. Accelerated by deforestation and extreme weather events.

SnowCoverDuration.label: Snow Cover Duration
SnowCoverDuration.details: Related to atmospheric temperature, glacier mass balance, and solar radiation absorption. Impacts water availability and albedo effect.

SeaTemperatureSST.label: Sea Temperature (SST)
SeaTemperatureSST.details: Impacts ocean life, alters water quality, and influences precipitation patterns. Affected by greenhouse gases and solar radiation absorption.

WaterQualityIndicatorsPH.label: Water Quality Indicators (pH)
WaterQualityIndicatorsPH.details: Interact with SST, precipitation, and erosion. Affected by atmospheric pollution and greenhouse gas levels.

SoilCompositionAndQuality.label: Soil Composition and Quality
SoilCompositionAndQuality.details: Affected by precipitation, erosion rates, and forest cover. Impacts plant growth, water quality, and biodiversity.

ForestCover.label: Forest Cover
ForestCover.details: Regulates atmospheric CO2, influences soil composition, erosion rates, and biodiversity indices. Affected by changes in precipitation and temperature.

BiodiversityIndices.label: Biodiversity Indices
BiodiversityIndices.details: Influenced by forest cover, atmospheric conditions, precipitation, and soil quality. Affected by habitat changes and climate variables.
